Transcript: James: Your opening night, master. Are you nervous?
Caleb: Strange. I'm hours away from getting all my power back.

James: Enjoy this evening. Watch your enemies fall one by one. In all my 
years, i have never seen such skill, determination, and courage.
Caleb: Thank you, james. Thank you.

James: It's been an honor playing my small part, master caleb. I regret only 
that i cannot serve you through eternity. But from this night on, fear nothing. 
Your skills are at their peak, and your resourceful young bride is at your side.
Caleb: You're willing to admit that now.
James: I misjudged. I leave you, happily, well-matched and well-guarded.

Caleb: Alas, thank you, james -- for your service to my family and your 
friendship to me.

James: Knowing I've done my job well in your eyes is the reward i take with 
me to the darkness.

James: Good fortune, master. May rivers of blood spill over the centuries for 
you and your lovely bride till the sun burns cold.

Caleb: Sleep well, james, now and forever. You've earned it, as i have earned 
tonight. Very soon my guests will know exactly what i have in store for them.
Alison: What are you doing here?

alison: I said put me down!

Rafe: That i would give anything just to be normal, to not have to face this

Rafe: Believe me, it's not because I don't want to. See, that -- that's half

alison: But -- but what?

caleb: Nice to see you, too, doctor. And you, doctor. Doctor. All you
